channel.title: Bash on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Shell HIstory Meme
item.description:
[jbowes@laptop ~]$ history | awk '{a[$2]++ } END{for(i in a){print a[i] " " i}}'|sort -rn|head 211 git 148 fg 107 ls 99 cd 89 python 43 make 26 vim 23 sudo 20 nosetests 19 player/swfplay

[jbowes@workstation ~]$Â  history | awk '{a[$2]++ } END{for(i in a){print a[i] " " i}}'|sort -rn|head -n 12 163 ls 156 cd 115 svn 76 vim 70 screen 55 fg 47 exit 35 sudo 30 git 21 yasql

Seen on Adrian’s and Mike’s blogs.
